explainsAboutApp: We created a simple app for you to pledge your support to the Earth Day goals.
firstEarthDay: The first Earth Day was held on April 22, 1970.
20MillionPeople: 20 million people recognized the first Earth Day.
doYouPledge: Do you pledge to support the goals of Earth Day?
thankYou: Thank you for taking part in our Earth Day fun!
explainShowQRCode: Show your QR code to someone else to receive EARTHDAY tokens from them
explainScanQRCode: Scan someone's QR code to send them EARTHDAY tokens.
youHaveReceived: You have now received one EARTHDAY token. Play the Earth Day game to win the prize!
chooseLanguage: You may choose your language here. English is the default if we don't have any others.
title: Earth Day
unableToShowQR: Unable to Show the QR code
unableToReadQR: Unable to read the QR code
